text: kaha, "achchha, too ja! ab is jeevan mein tere lie yahee hai ki kahata rahe, koee chhue nahin! aur nishchit vaada hai, jo tere lie ek nishchit vaada hai, jo tujhapar se kadaapi na talega. aur dekh apane isht-poojy ko jisapar too reejha-jama baitha tha! ham use jala daalenge, phir use choorn-vichoorn karake dariya mein bikher denge.
